<div data-page="{"component":"ycdc_new/pages/Companies/ShowPage","props":{"currentUser":null,"company":{"id":29001,"slug":"vectorshift","name":"VectorShift","batch_name":"S23","small_logo_url":"https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5a28987b3e1b3effc2a33ce770fc25f4424fc775.png","one_liner":"No-Code Generative AI Automations Platform","website":"https://www.vectorshift.ai","long_description":"VectorShift is an AI automations platform. Teams leverage AI through VectorShift’s no-code or SDK interfaces to search through knowledge bases, generate documents, and deploy chatbots and assistants.

The no-code platform gives end-users an interface to access pre-built workflows for end use cases (e.g., responding to RFPs, writing proposals, writing account plans) while letting them customize and build new ones with drag and drop components.

days","lastActive":null}],"jobsUrl":"https://bookface.ycombinator.com/workatastartup","newsItems":[{"title":"Exclusive: VectorShift raises $3M to modularize LLM application development | VentureBeat","url":"https://venturebeat.com/ai/exclusive-vectorshift-raises-3m-to-modularize-llm-application-development/","date":"Feb 21, 2024"}],"newsUrl":"https://bookface.ycombinator.com/company/29001/company_news","launches":[{"id":80383,"title":"VectorShift: No-code generative AI platform","body":"[VectorShift](http://www.vectorshift.ai/) is a no-code generative AI platform. Teams leverage AI through VectorShift’s no-code interface to search through knowledge bases, automate workflows, and deploy AI chatbots and assistants without needing to code or having knowledge about AI. 

[ ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t18ySXNDYvs)

**VectorShift Platform**

Through drag-and-drop components, VectorShift’s no-code builder allows you to: 

* Use a flexible visual programming language to prototype, build, deploy, and manage LLM apps.
* Allow AI workflows to leverage a knowledge base with your data (e.g., files, documents, website). Knowledge bases live-sync with data across your tools (e.g., Google Drive, OneDrive, Notion, etc.).
* Define triggers that automatically run workflows (e.g., Slack message) and allow workflows to perform actions (e.g., write a notion document).

Hundreds of companies across healthcare, finance, technology, education, logistics, and professional services already use VectorShift in production. Here are some real-life examples: 

* Startups (including multiple YC startups!) use VectorShift to power the “backend” of their **AI product features**.
* A European conglomerate uses VectorShift to **automate report writing** for clients.
* A professional services firm for the US government uses VectorShift to **automate RFP proposals** and **search through their contract library** to answer queries.
* A healthcare education company uses VectorShift to create a **chatbot** to answer patient questions leveraging their extensive knowledge base.
* A large technology company built an **internal support assistant** to answer questions about employee policies

And much more…

Other use cases our customers have in production: document analysis at scale, scraping internet data, content creation, and automatically sending personalized outbound emails.  

**Chat / Assistant Interface Product Launch**

In building our no-code builder, users requested a way to place interfaces on workflows so they can automate workflows end to end. Today, we are launching VectorShift’s assistant product!

Step 1: After building an AI workflow, place a chat / AI assistant-style interface in your workflow.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=80383&key=user_uploads/1325592/7dc154c9-2642-41f4-8342-43b5cf74590f)

Step 2: Fully customize the interface with your branding to share chat assistants internally or export to end-users / clients via URL, iFrame, Whatsapp / SMS, API, or as a Slack bot.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=80383&key=user_uploads/1325592/7c67a1e3-e464-410d-ac95-6c8352cc110d)

Step 3: Manage your production app by viewing collected data and analytics.  

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=80383&key=user_uploads/1325592/73cbd04f-6fc2-4f81-b794-b086a3af5e62)

**About Us:**

Alex Leonardi: BA/MS in Statistics & Computer Science from Harvard. Previously, he was a Private Equity Data Science Analyst at Blackstone, where he deployed AI/ML solutions for portfolio companies and helped establish Blackstone's perspectives and capabilities surrounding Generative AI.

Albert Mao: BA in Statistics at Harvard. Albert worked at McKinsey where he helped Fortune 500 organizations digitally transform along with revamping the GTM motions and products of multiple enterprise software companies. 

**The Ask:**

* Try VectorShift: <http://www.vectorshift.ai/>
* If you are interested in discussing this further, book a demo here: <https://calendly.com/albert_mao/vectorshift-intro-chat>. We provide hands-on support in identifying, building, and deploying AI solutions.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=80383&key=user_uploads/1325592/393b980e-d835-4fbc-aee9-1ab57672b0e3)

","tagline":"Build AI assistants and workflow automations in no-code","created_at":"2024-04-24T14:55:24.660Z","company":{"id":29001,"name":"VectorShift","logo":"https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/5a28987b3e1b3effc2a33ce770fc25f4424fc775.png","batch":"s2023","tags":["Artificial Intelligence","Developer Tools","Generative AI","No-code","Infrastructure"],"url":"https://www.vectorshift.ai","slug":"vectorshift","description":"No-Code Generative AI Automations Platform"},"user":{"name":"Albert Mao","avatar":"https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/avatars/50fe2ce6dc18668906c80c3ca29b601ba09c2813.jpg"},"total_vote_count":18,"slug":"KuV-vectorshift-no-code-generative-ai-platform","launch_embed_url":"https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/KuV-vectorshift-no-code-generative-ai-platform/upvote_embed.svg","twitter_share_url":"https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=VectorShift+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AVectorShift%3A+No-code+generative+AI+platform.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FKuV-vectorshift-no-code-generative-ai-platform","sanitized_title":"VectorShift: No-code generative AI platform","ycdc_launch_url":"https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/KuV-vectorshift-no-code-generative-ai-platform","url":"https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/KuV-vectorshift-no-code-generative-ai-platform","share_config":{"url":"/media/?type=post&id=80383&key=user_uploads/1325592/393b980e-d835-4fbc-aee9-1ab57672b0e3"},"share_image":null},{"id":77798,"title":"VectorShift - The AI Automation Platform","body":"[VectorShift](http://www.vectorshift.ai/) is an AI automation platform. Teams leverage AI through VectorShift’s no-code interface or Python SDK to search through knowledge bases, generate documents, and deploy chatbots and assistants. We give all organizations the ability to build enterprise-grade AI applications.

[ ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WWS0uj-ed8U)

# **VectorShift Platform**

Through drag-and-drop components, our no-code builder allows you to: 

* Connect different nodes like LLMs, data loaders, vector databases, and more.
* Create a knowledge base of your data (e.g., CRM, Notion database, files) or live sync with your data sources to leverage within AI pipelines.
* Create automations that trigger the running of pipelines (e.g., Slack message / Email) and allow pipelines to perform actions (e.g., write a notion document).
* Deploy your pipeline through a chat interface with just a few clicks. Share chat assistants internally, or export to end-users via URL, WhatsApp / SMS, or API.

![uploaded image](/media/?type=post&id=77798&key=user_uploads/1325592/3a8a510a-c672-49cb-82a6-4182d368295d)

# **What are real examples of companies using VectorShift in production?**

* A startup uses VectorShift to power the “backend” of their **AI product features**.
* A European conglomerate uses VectorShift to **automate report writing** for clients.
* A professional services firm for the US government uses VectorShift to **automate sales proposals** and **search through their contract library** to answer queries.
* A healthcare education company uses VectorShift to create a **chatbot** to answer patient questions leveraging their extensive knowledge base.
* A large technology company built an **internal support assistant** to answer questions about employee policies.

And much more…

To name a few: document analysis, scoring resumes, drafting patents and legal documents, and automatically sending personalized outbound emails.  

# **Python SDK Launch**

In building our initial product line, users requested a way to interface with our platform through code, so we’ve built a Python SDK for working with our various product lines. Now, you can access functionality present in our no-code platform directly through your IDE. Using the SDK, you can:

* Fetch, edit, save, and run your pipelines and chatbots. Run your AI workflows and use your preferred version-control system to work with your VectorShift-managed AI pipelines in code.
* Load and query your vector stores, and add new indices to index your data.
* Work with any connected integrations, like Notion, OneDrive, Slack, etc.

Any changes you save through the SDK will automatically update in the no-code platform so you can enjoy complete interoperability between the two interfaces. You can view the documentation for our SDK here: <https://docs.vectorshift.ai/vectorshift/developers/sdk/getting-started>

# **About Us:**

[Alex Leonardi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexanderleonardi/): BA/MS in Statistics & Computer Science from Harvard. Previously Private Equity Data Science Analyst at Blackstone, where he deployed AI/ML solutions for portfolio companies and helped establish Blackstone's perspectives and capabilities surrounding Generative AI.

[Albert Mao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/albert-mao-8b263aa2/): BA in Statistics at Harvard. Albert worked at McKinsey where he helped Fortune 500 organizations digitally transform along with revamping the GTM motions and products of multiple enterprise software companies.

Enterprises use us to build internal tools to generate marketing copy, proposals, and RFP responses. Startup teams use us to automate workflows such as writing personalized emails and deploying chatbots.

[ ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKhVKJGOqDM&ab_channel=AlbertMao)

**Introduction**

This is [Alex Leonardi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexanderleonardi/) and [Albert Mao](https://www.linkedin.com/in/albert-mao-8b263aa2/) - we studied CS and statistics together at Harvard and previously, we grew a business >200% Y/Y to 7 figures as CEO and CRO. During that time, we realized that our sales reps were spending more than half their time 1) writing proposals, 2) writing personalized outreach emails, and 3) researching prospects. If we could automate these workflows, we would be able to reach more leads and grow faster!

However, there was no way to build these custom generative AI workflows at scale, meaning that we had to build all of our tooling from scratch. That's why we built VectorShift - it is what we wished we had when running our previous business.

**VectorShift Platform**

Our platform’s core features include:

* **Pipeline Builder:** Connect different nodes like LLMs, data loaders, vector databases, and more.
* **File Handling:** Pass files as inputs and save them as outputs while using pipeline nodes to parse their meaning.
* **Deployment Acceleration:** A marketplace of pre-built workflows, easily customizable for your needs.
* **Reusable Components:** Use previous pipelines as nodes in new ones, allowing quick reuse of existing functionality.
* **Chatbot Creation:** Convert any pipeline into a Chatbot with just a few clicks.
* **API Integration:** Run pipelines and chatbots easily with API calls.
* **Public Marketplace:** Run pipelines that other users have already refined, and publish your own pipelines for others to use.

Our pipeline builder allows the user to quickly connect different components needed in a generative AI workflow. For example, sales reps use VectorShift to replicate the logic they use to write account proposals and reclaim hours of time every day.

![](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/9Tn6V3lthGLkz2zdpQWlkiSt2CRQpVJXdB8dNREiJhl81zIsMhGwx7EQhMP3Wy5YqGeW9QE3n0Sn2zzw0jyVsYRVKmUhnkNl6oI37RuxWOBCZYNX7NtJX-hzqrXlAtlHKk9vUD2Laod0fiGa8z5RNXw)

In addition to providing the building blocks of building any generative AI workflow, we further accelerate the deployment process by offering a marketplace of pre-built workflows. Want a pipeline that generates personalized emails? We already have one built for you to modify to your liking. 

![](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/_TH3ixjhoNzuK5EyaDje9ZHVauXOOvSB4BeUTj2GJq_UIQqjlSG1y7Ang05A5rIxm9y05emBo4IhQHD5pj7QZJfDp2oDsM7qtTGXIgLTlDhLoV806oUMNvUmAqlr9VKD854q2SBiJjMcKisdpRxF62w)

**About Us:**

Alex Leonardi: BA/MS in Statistics & Computer Science from Harvard. Previously Private Equity Data Science Analyst at Blackstone, where he deployed AI/ML solutions for portfolio companies and helped establish Blackstone's perspectives and capabilities surrounding Generative AI.

Albert Mao: BA in Statistics at Harvard. Albert worked at McKinsey where he helped Fortune 500 organizations digitally transform along with revamping the GTM motions and products of multiple enterprise software companies.
